Verses: 1 pinbu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyargalil Oruvanum Than Janaththaaril Irandhupona Yaadhoruvarukkaagath Thangalai Theettuppaduththalaagaadhu Endru Avargalode Sol.
2 than Thaayum, Than Thagappanum, Than Kumaaranum, Than Kumaaraththiyum, Than Sagodharanum,
3 purushanukku Vaazhkkaippadaamal Thannidaththilirukkira Kanniyaasthreeyaana Than Sagodhariyumaagiya Thanakku Nerungina Inamaana Ivargaludaiya Saavukkaagath Theettuppadalaam.
4 than Janaththaaril Periyavanaagiya Avan Veroruvarukkaagavum Thannaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkith Theettuppaduththalaagaadhu.
5 avargal Thangal Thalaiyai Mottaiyadikkaamalum, Thangal Thaadiyin Orangalai Siraiththuppodaamalum, Thangal Dhegaththaik Keerikkollaamalum Iruppaargalaaga.

6 thangal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaamal Avarukketra Parisuththaraayiruppaargalaaga; Avargal Karththarin Thaganapaligalaiyum Thangal Dhevanudaiya Appaththaiyum Seluththugiravargalaadhalaal Parisuththaraayirukkavendum.

7 avargal Thangal Dhevanukkup Parisuththamaanavargal, Aagaiyaal Vesiyaiyaagilum Karpukkulaindhavalaiyaagilum Vivaagampannaargalaaga; Than Purushanaale Thallappatta Sthreeyaiyum Vivaagampannaargalaaga.

8 avan Dhevanudaiya Appaththai Seluththugirapadiyaal Nee Avanaip Parisuththappaduththavendum; Ungalaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththaraagiya Naan Parisuththaraayirukkirapadiyaal, Avanum Unakku Munbaagap Parisuththanaayiruppaanaaga.
9 aasaariyanudaiya Kumaaraththi Vesiththanampanni, Thannaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkinaal, Aval Than Thagappanaiyum Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkugiraal; Aval Akkiniyile Sutterikkappadakkadaval.

10 than Sagodhararukkulle Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagath Than Sirasil Abishegathailam Vaarkkappattavanum, Avanukkuriya Vasthirangalaith Tharikkumpadi Pradhishtaipannappattavanumaayirukkiravan Evano, Avan Than Paagaiyai Edukkaamalum, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkollaamalum,
11 predham Kidakkum Idaththil Pogaamalum, Than Thagappanukkaagavum Than Thaaikkaagavum Thannaith Theettuppaduththikkollaamalum,

12 parisuththa Sthalaththilirundhu Purappadaamalum, Than Dhevanudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkaamalum Iruppaanaaga; Avanudaiya Dhevanin Abishegathailam Ennum Kreedam Avanmel Irukkiradhe: Naan Karththar.
13 kannigaiyaayirukkira Pennai Avan Vivaagampannavendum.
14 vidhavaiyaanaalum Thallappattavalaiyaanaalum Karpu Kulaindhavalaiyaanaalum Vesiyaiyaanaalum Vivaagampannaamal, Than Janangalukkulle Oru Kannigaiyai Vivaagampannakkadavan.
15 avan Than Viththaith Than Janangalukkulle Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaamal Iruppaanaaga; Naan Avanaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
16 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
17 nee Aaronode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Un Sandhadhiyaarukkulle Angaveenamullavan Thalaimuraithorum Dhevanudaiya Appaththai Seluththumpadi Seralaagaadhu.
18 angaveenamulla Oruvanum Anugalaagaadhu; Kurudanaanaalum, Sappaaniyaanaalum, Kurugina Alladhu Neenda Avayavamullavanaanaalum,
19 kaalodindhavanaanaalum, Kaiyodindhavanaanaalum,
20 koonanaanaalum, Kullanaanaalum, Poovizhundha Kannanaanaalum, Soriyanaanaalum, Asarullavanaanaalum, Vidhai Nasunginavanaanaalum AnugalaagaadhuÂ .
21 aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Sandhadhiyaaril Angaveenamulla Oruvanum Karththarin Thaganapaligalai Seluththa Seralaagaadhu.
22 avan Than Dhevanudaiya Appamaagiya Magaa Parisuththamaanavaigalilum Matra Parisuththamaanavaigalilum Pusikkalaam.

23 aanaalum Avan Angaveenamullavanaagaiyaal, Avan En Parisuththa Sthalangalaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaadhapadikkuth Thiraikkulle Pogaamalum Palipeedaththandaiyil Seraamalum Iruppaanaaga; Naan Avargalaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
24 mose Ivaigalai Aaronodum Avan Kumaararodum Isravel Puththirar Anaivarodum Sonnaan.
